title: Chair of Quebec Rare Diseases Table
desc: Dr. Donald Vinh appointed co-chair of Quebec’s national strategic table on rare diseases, supporting research, diagnosis, and access to care.

title: Former NASA engineer warns about heat shield on Artemis II moon mission
desc: After years of delays, NASA's Artemis II mission is aiming to launch next month. But issues with the heat shield are causing some to raise the alarm.

title: Benfica 0-1 Real Madrid, Monaco 2-3 PSG, and more: Champions League - as it happened
desc: Clockwatch: Exciting victories for Galatasaray and PSG were overshadowed by the apparent racist abuse of Vinícius Júnior. Scott Murray was watching

title: Richard Roxburgh, Damon Herriman and Toby Schmitz star in 'wickedly funny' play Art
desc: In the 1994 French play Art, Serge spends 160,000 euros on an all-white painting, horrifying his friend Marc. It might just wreck their decades-long friendship.

title: Turkish groups call for arrest of IDF soldier holding dual citizenship
desc: Islamist groups publish soldier's personal details and urge prosecutors to charge her under genocide laws after IDF report revealed 112 soldiers hold Turkish citizenship among more than 50,000 dual nationals in the military

title: Ottawa kept people on Canada's no-fly list without 'necessary grounds': spy watchdog
desc: A new report from the national spy watchdog says the federal government kept some people on Canada's no-fly list without proper justification.

title: Super Falcons to face Cameroon in WAFCON 2026 friendly
desc: Nigeria's Super Falcons are set to play two friendly matches against Cameroon's Indomitable Lionesses in preparation for the 2026 WAFCON.

title: Invitation to Trouble: The Rise of Calendar Phishing Attacks
desc: Threat actors are increasingly abusing Microsoft and Google Calendar invites to deliver convincing phishing attacks that steal user credentials by mimicking everyday workplace activity. This blog breaks down real-world campaigns observed by the Cofense Phishing Defense Center, showing how spoofed invites, urgent language, and fake login pages are used to bypass user suspicion.

title: AP source: Tony Clark to resign as executive director of MLBPA
desc: Tony Clark is reportedly expected to announce his resignation as executive director of the Major League Baseball Players Association.

title: Family wedding dress link revealed at Queen's visit
desc: The Queen has visited Bath in a series of engagements to showcase the city's arts and culture.
